summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley between Block 2, Dawson's 2nd Addition, Block 4, Albert Addition, and Block 13, Hillman's Lake Front Addition, Division No. 2, being the alley from Fremont Avenue to Dayton Avenue, between North 77th Street and North 78th Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Resolution No. 9756 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
